product_name: INNO Multi-Fork Lock Rooftop Bike Mount
long_description: If your mountain bike has a thru axle, and you also ride a road bike, choose the INNO Multi-Fork Lock Rooftop Bike Mount. It fits both regular forks and thru axles thanks to the included adapters.
short_description: If your mountain bike has a thru axle, and you also ride a road bike, choose the INNO Multi-Fork Lock Rooftop Bike Mount. It fits both regular forks and thru axles thanks to the included adapters.
